Package org.threadly.concurrent

Tools to assist in writing high performing and safe concurrent java code.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlockingQueueConsumer.ConsumerAcceptor<T>
    Interface for an implementation which can accept consumed tasks.
    CallableContainerInterface<T>
    Interface to implement if any classes are containing a callable.
    PrioritySchedulerInterface
    This interface represents schedulers which can not only execute and schedule tasks, but run based off a given priority as well.
    RunnableContainerInterface
    Interface to implement if any classes are containing a runnable.
    SimpleSchedulerInterface
    An interface for a simple thread pool that accepts scheduled and recurring tasks.
    SubmitterExecutorInterface
    A thread pool for executing tasks with provided futures.
    SubmitterSchedulerInterface
    A thread pool for scheduling tasks with provided futures.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockingQueueConsumer<T>
    Producer consumer problems are very frequent within multi-threaded code.
    ExecutorWrapper
    A simple wrapper class for Executor implementations to provide SubmitterExecutorInterface capabilities.
    ListenerHelper
    Class which assist with holding and calling to listeners.
    NoThreadScheduler
    Executor which has no threads itself.
    PriorityScheduledExecutor
    Executor to run tasks, schedule tasks.
    PriorityScheduledExecutorServiceWrapper
    This is a wrapper for PriorityScheduledExecutor to be a drop in replacement for any ScheduledExecutorService (aka the ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor interface).
    PrioritySchedulerStatisticTracker
    An implementation of PriorityScheduledExecutor which tracks run and usage statistics.
    PrioritySchedulerWrapper
    Class to wrap any implementation of PrioritySchedulerInterface.
    RunnableChain
    A class to chain multiple runnables to later be run together, within the same thread.
    ScheduledExecutorServiceWrapper
    This is a wrapper for the ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor to use that implementation with the SubmitterSchedulerInterface.
    TaskExecutorDistributor
    TaskDistributor is designed to take a multi-threaded pool and add tasks with a given key such that those tasks will be run single threaded for any given key.
    TaskSchedulerDistributor
    This is a class which is more full featured than TaskExecutorDistributor, but it does require a scheduler implementation in order to be able to perform scheduling.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TaskPriority
    Priority to go with tasks when being submitted into implementations of PrioritySchedulerInterface.

Package org.threadly.concurrent Description

Tools to assist in writing high performing and safe concurrent java code. These are a complement to the tools provided by java.util.concurrent.
